text: geudeul-eun midneun jadeul-eul mannal ttaemyeon “midseubnida”lago malhago, geudeul seologa hollo iss-eul ttaemyeon malhagil “geudaedeul-eun hananimkkeseo geudaedeul-ege allyeojusin geos-eul geudeul-ege iyagi haejuneun geos-inga? geuleomyeon geudeul-eun geudaedeul junim ap-eseo geugeos-eulosseo geudaedeul-ege nonjaeng-eul hal geos-ila”. geuleoni geudaedeul-eun iseong-eul sseuji anhgessneunga
